title: The John Bosco & Courtney O'Bryan 1st Annual Memorial Turkey Bowl
desc: The 1st Annual John Bosco & Courtney O'Bryan ?Turkey Bowl is in honor of two amazing kids that were taken from us way too soon by tragic accidents. ?John and Courtney were caring, compassionate, funny, friendly and non-judgmental people who gave everything they had and expected nothing in return. ?We honor them with this fundraiser that will keep their scholarships available for years to come and do what they would want......help others succeed.
